name: Harshith Parsa
about: Specialized in building high-performance architectures and premium digital experiences using the MERN stack. I bridge the gap between complex backend logic and pixel-perfect frontend execution.

projects.title: Convozo
projects.description: A real-time chat application with modern UI, featuring instant messaging, user authentication, and seamless communication experience.

projects.title: VibeMate
projects.description: A social networking platform designed to connect people based on shared interests and vibes. Built with TypeScript for type-safe development.

projects.title: SnapKart
projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform with intuitive shopping experience, product catalog, cart management, and secure checkout functionality.

projects.title: Portfolio App
projects.description: A premium, animated portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and achievements with glassmorphic design and smooth animations.

achievements.title: Premium Portfolio Launch
achievements.detail: Successfully deployed the elite static version of the Harshith.dev ecosystem.
